entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text:
@narendramodi Guys pls take this Lockdown very seriously. You are saving not only yourself by this but your family and whole India. 
Life is giving you chance to fight like a brave soldier by just sitting at home only. Pls support  our govt @narendramodi sir in this. #Covid19 #lockdown #india https://t.co/9oZfPRlJG2
